about_the_game:
Once you have downloaded this content, you can set a new master by going to Hidden Leaf Village in the online lobby followed by the Ninjutsu Library.

A special training pack for your avatar!

As you train with Kawaki, you will acquire Training Points that can be used to unlock a wide variety of Ninjutsu and costumes for your avatar!

Content includes:
• 3 Ninjutsu
- Karma Linchpin (Strange Taste)(Attack Type)
- Scientific Ninja Tool: Imperial Wrath (Attack Type)
- Emergency Exit (Substitution Jutsu)

• 1 Secret Technique
- Karma Linchpin (Ritual Destruction)(Attack Type)

• 2 Avatar Parts
- Accessory: Kawaki's Piercings for male/female avatars
- Face: Kawaki

• 1 Weapon
- Scientific Ninja Tool "Carapace" (Attack Type)

• Additional Content
- Ninja Tools: Scientific Ninja Tool "Scale Fragment"
- Honorary Title: Vessel

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8350K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 640
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.30GHz / AMD FX-6300 Six-Core
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 270X / R7 265 2 GB / Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
